issue.title: [R] support the quoted_na argument in open_dataset for CSVs by mapping it to CSVConvertOptions$strings_can_be_null
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18355](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18355). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18355?focusedCommentId=17636012) by Will Jones (willjones127):*
This feature is "soft-deprecated" in readr. Do we still want to add support?
